Articles.Content:
What did you do today? Go to work? Go to school? Sleep in home? Set off firecrackers (play KSP)? Or do something else.

Edited March 25, 2019 by ZZYZZY
Monday, Monday. Can't trust that day. Every other day of the week is fine.

I woke up.

Now I'm at work.

I'll do some things at work.

Then I'll go home, and lie to myself that I'm going to do housework while I sit at my computer and flip between games until I actually catch interest in something.

Then I'll watch an episode of Game Of Thrones, and go to bed.

Woke up at 4:30 a.m. to neighbors arguing in the townhouse next door. Close enough to wakeup time; no point in trying to go back to sleep.

So, I got out of bed and had my first cup of coffee. Enjoyed it in peace. Then made wife and daughter breakfast (as I normally do). Scrambled eggs, home made hash browns, bacon, and toast. 

Now, am doing normal work stuff. Answering student emails, grading exams and writing assignments, and at some point today, I need to order course books for the Fall 2019 semester.

Actually got to sleep in this morning. Thing #2 came in at his usual 5:30, but he was still sleepy so he just crawled into bed next to his mom and went back to sleep, didn't wake everyone up. Thing #3 (aka Princess Cranksalot) came in at around 6:30 and broke that spell. I got up at around 7:15, showered, shaved, and got dressed. Got in to work at around 8:00. And now I'm doing what I do at work now: Waiting for something to happen. I have a big evolution towards the end of the week related to our ongoing construction, should be some excitement vague interest then.

I woke up at some time ( is it sad I can't remember what time that was? Maybe I'm still dreaming? ) , cleaned my room , signed up for these forums , and I'm about to go to school .

 

Then I'll probably play either play KSP or War Thunder when I get home. And then I'll go to bed.
Long day of classes and labs. I have a lull over lunchtime, luckily.
Monday. Ugh. The first five days after the weekend are the worst

Woke up, felt sick, managed not to throw up, got ready for work, and went in three hours late.

Did some work, listened to the ex whine about her sick family, left work.

Came home, checked the mail, was too lazy to make dinner, melted some "cheese", and am eating it with chips while reading the internet.

 

So, pretty much the same thing as every day (except the being sick part).
It's Tuesday for me . Woke up, had breakfast, ran to the bus (just made it in time). Am currently writing this in class

23 minutes ago, The_Cat_In_Space said:

It's Tuesday for me . Woke up, had breakfast, ran to the bus (just made it in time). Am currently writing this in class

If you’re in class, perhaps you should be paying attention or doing some schoolwork instead of fiddling with your phone device on the forums. Just sayin....

Edited March 25, 2019 by StrandedonEarth

I found out last night at about 5pm that I had to work 8pm-6am. I normally work 3rd shift but I'd been up all day because it was a weekend.

So I spent the first 6 hours exhausted. I then slept about 12 and woke up a bit ago. Now I'm getting ready to go back to work for my normal shift.

So not much

20 minutes ago, StrandedonEarth said:

If you’re in class, perhaps you should be paying attention or doing some schoolwork instead of fiddling with your phone device on the forums. Just sayin....

Lol. Forums comes first
Went to school, studied for midterms, went home, played KSP (I should probably be studying).
